MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L37 postcode area of Formby affecting properties in Old Town Lane and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:10am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:20pm on the 24th February 2021.
